text: Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for AAA gaming. The NVIDIA RTX 2080 in the Acer Predator Triton 900 PT917-71-71C5 17.3" 4K/UHD IPS Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2080 32 GB Memory 1 TB SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for competitive gaming. The NVIDIA RTX 2080 in the Acer Predator Triton 900 PT917-71-71C5 17.3" 4K/UHD IPS Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2080 32 GB Memory 1 TB SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Cyberpunk 2077 and Starfield. The build quality of the Acer Predator Triton 900 PT917-71-71C5 17.3" 4K/UHD IPS Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2080 32 GB Memory 1 TB SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop is solid, and the fan noise is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for streaming games is incredible, especially the NVIDIA RTX 2080. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The speakers is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the Acer Predator Triton 900 PT917-71-71C5 17.3" 4K/UHD IPS Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2080 32 GB Memory 1 TB SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop!
